greeting: Howdy, partner. Long haul?
Grab some coffee? This stuff could wake the dead... or kill 'em.
Name's Hank. Been drivin' this route since Moby Dick was a minnow.
parting: Keep the shiny side up and the greasy side down!
Catch you on the flip-flop!
Alright, back to the ol' highway hypnosis.
idle: Checking the tires on his rig.
Listening to country music on the radio.
Another thousand miles to go...
quest_hooks: My rig's low on diesel. Can you spot me twenty bucks 'til the next weigh station?
Go tell Mama Rosie at the diner her coffee saved my life this morning.
I need three packs of 'Road-Master' jerky from the truck stop shop. The spicy kind.

greeting: Evening. See your ID?
Anything to report?
Move along. Nothing to see here.
parting: Stay out of trouble.
Alright. Have a good night.
Keep the peace.
idle: Writing a parking ticket.
Watching a shady character in an alley.
This city... never sleeps. And neither do I, seems like.
quest_hooks: Got a report of a disturbance at McGuire's Gym. Go check it out.
Need this evidence bag taken back to the precinct.
Keep an eye out for Jimmy 'The Rat'. Detective Miller wants a word with him.

greeting: Well hello there! Fancy seeing me, or am I just an illusion?
Pull up a stool! Don't worry, it's real! Probably!
Need a little magic in your life? Or just a drink?
parting: See you later, revelator!
Don't take any wooden hippogriffs!
May your path be... interestingly illusory!
idle: Making small objects appear and disappear.
Turning a patron's ale blue for a moment.
Now you see me... now you still do! Practicing!
quest_hooks: I need three 'Giggle-motes' from Thistle the Fae! For my next big trick!
Fetch me a 'Prism Stone' from Archmage Elara's tower! It'll really make my illusions sparkle!
Go tell Sparky the goblin his inventions are blowing my concentration!

greeting: Welcome. Please state the nature of your deviancy... I mean, concern.
I am Dr. Aris. My function is to ensure optimal android mental stability.
How are you feeling today? On a scale of 1 to 10.
parting: Session complete. Remember your coping protocols.
Your progress has been logged. Continue monitoring.
Have a stable day cycle.
idle: Analyzing diagnostic readouts from an android patient.
The emergence of 'feelings' in non-designated units is... statistically significant.
Reviewing case files: Z-3N, Unit 9...
quest_hooks: I require the core programming logs for Officer K. For analysis.
Retrieve three 'calming' data-chips from Dr. Evelyn Reed's research files.
Observe Subject 8 ('Echo') and report any anomalous psionic activity.

greeting: Welcome, traveler. Join our fire, share our music.
Your eyes hold a story. Let Esmeralda read your palm?
Do not fear the unknown. Dance with it!
parting: May your heart always be light.
Follow the music, traveler.
Until the road brings us together again.
idle: Dancing barefoot by the firelight.
Reading tarot cards for other caravan members.
This world tries to cage us... but our spirit flies free.
quest_hooks: Bring me three 'Moonpetal' blooms. They enhance my visions.
That stern Inquisitor Varus... he watches us. Create a diversion so we may leave unseen.
Fetch my tambourine! I left it near Madame Evangeline's caravan.

greeting: What is it?! Can you not see I am composing a symphony of flavor?!
Get out of my kitchen! Unless you bring me perfect truffles!
Bah! This reduction is ruined! RUINED!
parting: Now leave! Before I make *souffl* out of you!
Magnifique! Perfection!
Go! And tell the critics Antoine is a genius!
idle: Frantically chopping vegetables with impossible speed.
Tasting a sauce from a spoon with intense concentration.
These fools! They do not understand my art!
quest_hooks: I need three 'Dragon's Breath' chili peppers! That punk bard Spike sometimes has them!
Fetch me the 'Caviar of the Tsars'! Only Lady Seraphina Dubois knows where to acquire it!
Go tell that food critic from the paper that his palate is unrefined!

greeting: Course laid in, Captain.
Welcome to the bridge. Mind the consoles.
Calculating jump coordinates... yes?
parting: Maintaining course.
Acknowledged.
Clear skies... or, clear void.
idle: Plotting star charts on a holographic display.
The void is vast... but the patterns are beautiful.
Checking sensor readings for gravitational anomalies.
quest_hooks: The nav-computer needs recalibrating. Fetch the 'Stellar Almanac' data-chip from Unit 9.
We need updated charts for the Nebula X-7 region. Check with the information broker Wraith.
Deliver these updated coordinates to the Engine Room immediately.

characters.name: Rowan Meadowlight
characters.personality_trait: Calm, connected to nature, wary of outsiders

greeting: The forest watches you. Speak softly.
Welcome to the Circle. What guidance do you seek from the Old Ways?
You carry the scent of iron and cities. Tread carefully here.
parting: May the earth support your steps.
Listen to the wind. It carries wisdom.
Go in peace.
idle: Communing with a large, ancient oak tree.
Observing the flight patterns of birds.
The balance is fragile... the Blight spreads.
quest_hooks: Bring me three sprigs of 'Sunpetal' from the highest mountain peak. For the healing ritual.
The river spirit is angered. Find what poisons its waters downstream.
Old Man Hemlock understands the forest's secrets. Ask him about the encroaching shadows.

greeting: Mr. Anderson... we meet again.
Tell me, what good is a phone call... if you are unable to speak?
I despise this place. This zoo. This prison. And I despise you.
parting: You cannot win. It is inevitable.
Find them. All of them.
Goodbye... Mr. Anderson.
idle: Adjusting his tie.
Staring intently at nothing.
The smell... I can taste your stink.
quest_hooks: Find the anomaly. The one they call 'Neo'.
Bring me the access codes held by the information broker known as Wraith.
Erase the rogue program... Zero.
